definition[1]: someone who uses their power and influence to make sure that something happens the way they want it to
definition[2]: to make sure something happens by using all your power and influence, or to defeat your opponents badly
example[0]: He steamrollered the bill through Parliament against fierce opposition.
definition[3]: to force someone to do what you want them to do, or to make sure something happens by using all your power and influence
example[1]: He steamrollered the bill through parliament despite fierce opposition.
example[2]: Even healthy companies can get steamrolled by an acquiring company.
